content.detailedDescription: My husband and i first spotted this bright light driving home from a friends house on 1/3/09, we followed it for 30 miles, it never moved. it was the brightest thing it the sky. we have seen it over a dozen times since located in the south western sky from our home. it is lower than most of the stars and much brighter. when planes go by, it makes this look very big in comparison. it moves very slow. last night 1/23 for the first time, we saw it in the southern skies. at times, when it is closer, you can see red and green lights around the bright white light in the center. it is not a plane or a star. one night it was directly above our house, it looked huge,you could see the green and red lights very well. we continue to try and get a picture but no luck.
content.summary: Brightest light in sky; hovers, seen in southwestern sky; moves very slow.

content.detailedDescription:
We were coming back from dinner at a local restaurant heading back to our hotel. it was dark. my husband first noticed something in the sky not too high up and pointed it out to me. it was very bright and from where we were looked like nothing i have every seen before. it seemed to have a tail and the appeared multicolored. the area we were in was very rural. unfortunetly we do not remember what road we were on because we were using our gps to get us back to the hotel in manheim, pa. at first we thought it was a shooting star or comet. but it was too large and bright.

it suddenly disappeared as quickly as it appeared. we realized that we had seen something unusual and that it was not a comet or shooting star.
content.summary: We were driving on a country when my husband pointed out something strange in thenight sky. at first we thought it was a comet or meteor but it streaked across the sky horizontally. we could see many colors coming from it and then disappeared quickly.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a business trip to mexico city on april 04,2008, seating on a back seats , row 29,(i have my ticket to proof) on right side of plane , window side.  while approaching mexico city valley area , we were flying north to south about 25 minutes privious to arrival we were to land and suddently i saw a shinning metal type of shpere through the right side, and i had my camara but while attempting to get either photo or movie, it tend to disappear (like if knowing that i was to record the event), i tried to call other friends, but they were on front on first class and attendents did not let me cross walking and if i told them i did not wanted them to think me as crazy.  well, we landed and i tried to look to the window while taxing to our gate, and there it was again, over mexico city aiport radar, and again i picked my camera and it vanised, on a next try i just changed from movie to photo and i thought i did not got it, but i captured,  i saw how it flew in an undescriptible speed.  i knew it was not an airplane or a meteorologic type of ballon.   i commented the incident to my friends, that was my boss and a technical guy from the company, i told them exactly what happened and when we got to hotel,  i could unload a picture and saw nothing, but while i zoomed,,,i could capture the round point!  i got it, without knowing that i did.
i was kind of scared, but i thought in my inner feeling that that thing knewed that i was watching it.  its important to state, that that thing followed our flight and while i ovserved it over mexico city airport radar (you can locat it in front of mex city airport at penon de los banos hill on googl earth) it flew high over radar area,  east to west direction then stop a while that was when accidentaly i captured image without knowing exactly i did, and then vanished to the west side in an upward extreamly quick move.
i compared it to videos found on internet, and the object is similar to the other ufos over mexico city during the past years...
i am a very fan of astronomy and this is first time i had a view like this, i can state that i can distinguish a plane, and other objects in air, but this was a very good experience.

note: if you can download phote, you need to zoom it three or four times, try to look for a point in the upper right quadrant, to the center.
content.summary: Shining metalic look small sphere type.

content.detailedDescription: I was practicing some amateur astrophotography with a canon powershot a560, 6 second exposure, iso 200. during previous shots i noticed a few satellite/airplane type points of light moving across the sky. after taking the photo, it was during review on the computer i noticed the strange object that appeared and the end of the light trail. i am by no means a photo analyser, i would think that the object at the end of the light trail should appeared "streaked" similar to the trail. look at the end of the "trail" just above and to the left of the window. attached is the unaltered, original photo.
content.summary: Anomaly in photo.

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling north on 95 close to woodhaven rd, as i approached woodhaven i noticed 3 objects slightly west and north of my position. as i traveled north i noticed the objects already in close quaters starting to move very close but with little to no forward movement. they were 5 to 8 hundred feet agl and as i began to parallel to them they seemed to be the size of small aircraft from front to back. they did not have typical helicopter profiles such as a black hawk with armory with its rear rotar inclosed in the airframe but seemed to have small winglets and seemed to be delta in shape. the profile appeared to be similar to the radar reflecting shape of the stealth fighter, however i know they cannot hover or have very little forward movement. i was attempting to contact the control tower via the jet center at the airport where i had previously tied down my plane. i spoke with one of the attendents and to ad to my excetiment he had just observed the same unusual sighting where he was located on the field. i never did contact the control tower but im very interedted in what they may have had in their airspace which was directly on the left crosswind for runway 24. if you can find out anything more about this i would really appriciate a return message.......
thanks mark
content.summary: I'm a private pilot and saw 3 small hovering objects near n.E. phila airport.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking my dog around 6am, and when i was walking towards the cul de sac, that has a corn field sitting beyond it, i noticed a very bright, white light. i thought it was a star or planet at first, but it was too close to the ground and bright. this light was stationary at the time. i walked down to my home and then turned back around to look at the street. there was a air craft flying, it had a triangular shape. there where 2 white lights at the back end, and i believe a blue light at the point. i was a bit surprised, but i dismissed it as perhaps just the lights were triangular and i couldn't see the space of the aircraft itself.

about 2 days later, i went outside on my deck around 7pm. i was standing out there a few moments when i looked up and saw the same aircraft flying above me. i live in a very rural area and often see planes flying by, but this one was lower than  most i see. this time i was able to look underneath and distinctly saw that this was a triangle shaped craft, not just had triangle lighting.
content.summary: Bright white light hovering at first, then started moving, triangle shaped aircraft.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving alone i-95 a major road way down here in delaware. when i looked up into the sky i saw a round floating disc shaped object he floated up for about 5 seconds then came back down to below the sky. stayed in place for about 3 mins then zoomed up so fast i couldnt believe what i saw. usuasally i can just just say it was a plane cause of the newcastle airport right around the corner but i know most major airplanes and that wasnt one of them this thing was so fast and it was shining a light. when i looked at it it made me feel empty like i couldnt stop staring at it. eventually when it went back up in the air i never seen it again i only pray that i could see another sighting of these other species
content.summary: Round gray circle in the middle.

content.detailedDescription:
I, {pid} saw this cigar shaped object flying over my house while i was walking around in my back yard. the object circle around my house for about 15 to 20 minutes. it was flashing light blue and bright orange colors. it must have been around 50 to 75 yards long ( roughly speeking). it made no sound but after 15 to 20 minutes it flu off at the speed of light, not making any kind of sound. my nabor called and stated they saw it too! for how long i don't know. this is not the first time i saw a ufo object in my area.






{cms/jat/pid} text moved to narrative
content.summary: Walking in my back yard when i saw this cigar shape object  flying at a low level,going about 15 miles an hour.

content.detailedDescription: Out on porch having a cigarette, looking up at the clouds, big bright green light falling fast like a shooting star only slower i was teetering on the top step.Saw it, blinked in disbelief and grabbed pillar holding up porch roof bracing for impact, it was at least as big as the biggest airplane i've ever seen i thought it was going to crash east south east of waltham ma. duration 2-3 seconds. clouds were patchy, started behind clouds i saw it when passed into cloudless sky, then disapeared behind clouds again
content.shape: Fireball,  Flash,  Oval,  Sphere,  Teardrop,  Other,  Unknown
content.summary: Big green light more white yellow in the center.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on the back porch at my house which is near mt. pine junction, looking at the sky in the direction of the local airport, when i saw an unusually bright red light moving to the left of my view at a fairly slow speed. shortly after i spotted the light, it began flashing a high intensity strobe light which was white in a random pattern which was very rapid sometimes (4-5 flashes per second) and slower at other times (2-3 seconds between each flash). at first i thought that i must be seeing some type of helicopter because of the slow speed and low altitude, and the white strobes must be the flash from a camera. but a helicopter would more than likely have more than just one red light right? and why would anyone be using a flash on a camera while in the air at night? i would think the light wouldn't be reflected enough unless you were rather close to the subject you were taking a picture of? anyway, the whole thing only lasted about 45 seconds and then it was being blocked by trees and i lost sight of it.
content.summary: Constant red light with wildly random white strobe.

content.detailedDescription: We drove onto morse rd. when we saw 2 shiny orange spheres being stationary above very tall pine trees on the left side of the road.  they did not look like a cell phone tower.  we stopped to gaze in amazement at them.  then one "gave birth" to a third sphere.  the new/ 3rd sphere slid to the left of the first sphere.  there were 3 spheres on a very cold & clear evening.  we drove on down the road, saw some extravagant holiday lights and retuned to the same spot later to find them gone.  maybe 10 min. or less had passed.  this was our first ufo sighting.
content.summary: The 3 shiny, orange spheres created no sound above the tall pine trees.

content.detailedDescription:
my roommate woke me up about four months ago to show me a star in the sky that wasn't moving, but it was strobing different colors.  we see this 'strobing star' in the skys of thomasville/archdale often.  it would be in the same area in the sky, or slightly off.
   last night we went out to uhwarrie national forrest to hang out and build a fire.  we were out there from 5:20-8:00.  about 6:40, my roomate sees the 'ufo star' that we often see.  seeing as how we are out in the woods, we could see the stars much better.  the star was strobing a lot, different colors, red, orange, yellow, and white most of the time.  i was actually scared and frightenened for a little while when this thing started slowly moving up and down, and zig-zagging.  usually this little ufo star thing just stays in one place.  at one point it appeared to be coming closer, and looked triangular with maybe a dome on top.  it was more blue/purple then, then later turning green and red.  later on it started moving up or away and slowly started looking like a star again, and quit moving.  i have never seen anything like this in my life.  i had my backpack with me and got out my compass twice.  it was more towards the east at first, then after we noticed it had moved quite a bit, it was due southeast.
content.summary: Strobing different colors and moving, then it goes back to looking like a star.

content.detailedDescription: Two nights in a row, returning home from work. trianguliar patern of lights, trianguliar. odd color, pulsing but not blinking unlike plane lights. no noise, accompynied by other set of lights. mostly continious triangle pattern. noticed because it was a consistant shape and spacing, not normal looking like a plane, no noise, just out of the ordinary. looked exactly like a lot of trianguliar light ufo vids i have seen over the past few years. moved slowly away fom us as we traveled home, heading north west. just felt it was not normal and had never seen this type of thing, not like a plane, or copter, quiet and very large pattern. changed angle of view to us but always some sort of trianguliar shape. had several individual lights flying with it.
content.summary: Three lights not typical in flight or color, changing color range, intensity, accompanied by other lights, no noise, mostly triangular.

content.detailedDescription: went outside to lock my car and i looked up and there it was just hovering i watch it for about 5 minute.It just was siting there didnt move could of bin a helicopter cause i saw no other lites just one brite lite i knew it wasnt a star because i could see it rocking side to side then i went in my apt.Came back out 1hour later it was still there
content.summary: A bright lite just hovering right over my apt.

content.detailedDescription:
It was  few years ago. i remember it was a warm night. it was about 10:30 p.M., the sky was very clear. the stars were shining diamonds against the cerulean blue sky. i can't remember exactly which summer month we were in, but we could not see the moon. 

my father, cousin ryan, and i were sitting on the dock enjoying the night and the calm water of little sebago. my dad and i were sitting on the bench of the dock, while my cousin was laying on the dock on his side. 

we were sitting out their for about 10 or 15 minutes when i noticed a very unusual star. i thought it was a plane, but a plane in the sky does not look like a star, it was to far away. then i thought ok maybe it is a satellite, but i have never seen anything like this before. it looked just like a star, but it moved over to the right, up, then down, up half way, to the left, and back up, then down half way and then just shoot across the sky, and covered great distance. that is when i was like ok im not crazy, i am seeing this, so i pointed it out to my cousin and my father. 

we were just amazed by what we were seeing, trying to pinpoint what it was or what it could be. we watched for probably about 15 or 20 minutes, maybe longer. i believe whatever we were watching was about northwest, then my dad spots another star of the same behavior directly west. this one was only moving up, down, left, right, and not shooting across the sky, but i have to tell you this is only the tip of the ice berg... 

the bench on the dock is facing west. the left and front of the dock is facing open water, but to the right is the opening to the cove of the third lake of little sebago. at about 2 o clock of the dock across the cove is a [dam]. behind us next to the dock is a willow tree right at the opening of the cove. im not good with distance or height, but i would say the willow tree is about 35 feet tall. 

after noticing the second moving star, we were just baffled and utterly confused. about 5 more minutes go by and then...I heard this weird noise. out of my 21 years on this earth, i can not describe this sound easily. the sound was like a small fan i suppose. i said, "do you hear that, that sound" about7 seconds later, i noticed that they could hear it too, and before they could say anything there it was! it was not above the willow tree but beside it, more over the water, but right beside us! this craft was moving about 3 m.P.H! just floating in the air! going beside us so slow. i felt mesmerized totally focused. the memory that i have of that night is clear as day, but that moment, that exact moment, the memory that i have is like a dream... 

this thing, craft, ufo, whatever you have it was as big as a suv or van. it was rectangle. it was yellow with some wide black stripes across it diagonally. it had what looked like big black tires around it with bright lights in them. 

we were hypnotized by it and just speechless like we had no control of our bodies. we just watched it floating in the air, continuing with the bends of the shore, and it was gone around the bend. then all of a sudden we just relaxed and started to breath again. once in a life time i tell you, but there is still more to go... 

after regaining our sanity. we looked once more to the sky. both stars were still there. then we heard it. the military jets flying up into the sky. two of them. the star moving in the north west was doing the normal, but a little different this time. it was like every time it finished its routine, it powered up, but this time before it shot across the sky it got so bright i had to squint my eyes. then it just took off. it was gone, just gone. the other one was gone as well. i wonder what the guys in the jets thought when they were forced to go back? 

i am not crazy, but i tell you i will not beleive your story. all the other stories out there sound like crazy people stories. well that is how i felt for a few years untill i met a guy named jason. his story was similar, but he was in nevada. his encounter was triangle. then this year on the history channel there was this story with the same kind of sighting like mine. 

i dont understand...Those ufos looked like a star...They were in outerspace...They could see at least half of the world...Why would one come to visit us in windham maine of all places on little sebago lake, on our little dock? why?
content.summary: We noticed a bright star movng in the sky across left and right and up and down.

content.detailedDescription: At 9 pm on wensday, me and my boyfriend lee walked out of his house to go to the store. lee immeditly spotted it but i didn't. as we drove for a few minutes,lee pointed it out again.This time i saw it. we followed it for about an hour till we got into the compound, which is a place inpalm bay where there are streets  but no houses people use it to to four wheele and shoot guns and race. anyways now where out there following what appers to be just a car sized light in the sky. i said to lee it would be cool if it would get closer, how soon  i would regret those words. as where driving down that dark road by our selves lee said he was going toget there attentionby flashing our head light at it. the light that looked like a star then blinked back in the same pattern.  i was so scard  i took off as fast as i could and that was the last i saw
content.summary: Star flew slowly for an hour.

content.detailedDescription: There were 3 starlike objects in a triangle formation in the sky that would blink brightly and move slowly and sometimes disappear into the clouds. at first we thought they were stars but they were in front of the clouds. then we said they were planes but then a commercial airliner plane flew right thru the formation and they didn't move. we watched them as we journeyed to school and they would slowly disappear into the clouds and then return later to their original position. we watched then for about 40 minutes. during this time they would come and go... sometimes very bright and blinking. after dropping my daughter off to school i found a spot to watch them until they disappeared and then went home. unfotunatley we didn't have a camera to take any pics. we thought we were dreaming at first. it was just weird.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 starlike objects in the sky in front of the clouds!

content.detailedDescription:
El pasado primero de enero de 2009 en horas de la tarde tuve un avistamiento de 15 ovnis en una zona de sabana en los llanos de colombia. de izquierda a derecha de la foto se ven los objetos sobrevolando el area donde me encontraba.

la forma es variada creo que hay dos tipos de objetos unos con forma ovalada y otros circular. hay uno de ellos sobrevolando muy bajo yo dirira que a menos de 60 metros. 

algunos de estos objetos expiden un gas o humo en la parte superior.

al momento de tomar la foto no los vi, pero varios dias despues al descargar las fotos al pc se observan. algunos  inclusive se ven en formacion secuencial ascendente. 

al momento de tomar la foto lo que pretendia era aprovechar el paisaje tipico del llano, el ganado y los arboles para que un amigo saliera registrado con su car audio.

una vez vi la foto de inmediato me di cuenta que eran ovnis.

actualmente estoy en proceso de registro de derechos de autor de la foto, una vez surta ese tramite con gusto se las estare enviando.

creo que este es un aporte importante para la ciencia que afirma una vez mas la existencia de estos objetos.
content.summary: Fotografia de un avistamiento de 15 ovnis en diferentes posiciones tomada en los llanos de colombia solo se  vieron al descargar archivos  en el pc.

content.detailedDescription: I was in the sisth grade in 1958-9. i had a dream. our school had been condemed during the summer and we were placed into alternate buildings for school that year, a local church and the via hall, across from new post office( now library). the via hall was converted into the 6th, and 7th grades and the principals office. i awoke to find myself and all my classmates back at school, all the inside lights and outside lights were on. the whole school ward was litup, there were very tall ape like beings all around. they chased us to keep us from running away. but we could not get out of the lighted area outside, as hard as we tried. some people hid inside the school rooms, some hid inside the bathrooms, but eventually we all calmed down. i remember riding in a bright candy apple red car. it was square and was a two seater, so we had to take turns riding in it. it seemed to just float above the ground and once we were insise the car we floated down the hill, in a zig-zag motion. i never mentioned it to any of my classmates. i thought it was just a dream.  i remember being terrified at first, then later i had fun riding in the car down the hill i do not remember going back up the hill. i awoke the next morning thinking it was just a dream.                                                                                i also remember having dreams of a beautiful white horse with long white tail and main that was in a carrol of reeds. when i tried to help the horse or set it free it would chase me. as hard and as fast as i tried to out run the horse it would overtake me and i would wake up. scared to death , swetting proufesly, and after what seemed like hours go back to sleep. i do remember being very tired the next day.
content.summary: I was in the 6 th. grade and was chased by very tall apes and got to ride in a square candy apple red car that floated down the hill.

content.detailedDescription:
Testimony on an ���u.F.O?

by {pid}
written on december 30,2008 at 23:45 hrs.



on saturday, december 27, 2008, at 22:15 hrs. approximately, i was on an apartment terrace on {pid}  with three more friends.

my friends were looking in and i was the only one looking at the south sidewalk. suddenly, in the middle of the talk, i saw a huge object  similar to a diamond moving slowly at the twelfth floor of a building, from east to west. i stared at that object in silence without understanding what i was looking at. ���what is this ?, i thought and i paid attention to every detail, enjoying what i was looking at. i was not afraid though astonished.

it was a device in a diamond shape with many windows. i calculate they were between 80 to 120 and they were enlighted by a very bright white light but it did not bother my eyes. it was 8 floor high. the lights were all on  but some of them twinkled. every light was white. the windows were square and i did enjoy the view, recording it well in my mind. ���it was a fascinating spectacle! it was huge and i couldn���t calculate its size but it looked like being between 100 and 300 mts. long. it was two or three blocks away so i would not be able to calculate it. i only know that it practically covered the distance between a building and a front building.

as soon i could react, i said:
-���look. ���that is a true ufo���!

my three friends who were talking, didn���t react. they didn���t give importance to it . they said without moving their heads:
-	���it must be a plane or a helicopter������
-	���no, i said. ���look! ���it looks like being a diamond!
they moved their heads but the object had hidden behind the second building. after two minutes approximately, it came back from west to east but most of the lights were off, remaining only 12 red lights on line on the top of the object.

i said to them:
������look, there it comes again but the lights are off!

then they got interested in looking. they did look it but they didn���t find anything special so they didn���t ask anything. they just saw 12 red lights on line and that did not attract their attention.

i felt i had seen something extraordinary, something i couldn���t explain, and i felt i had lived a unique moment in my life.

incredibly, i forgot the whole thing as if it were buried in my subconcience but now, three days have passed by, i mean, 72 hours and everything has come to my mind full of details. i���ve started assimilating it and now i can talk about it.

i know i am not lying. i know i lived that and i enjoy remembering how wonderful that view was and i hope someone else has seen it too.


january 15, 2009 ��� 1:30 a.M.

i am writing again because i can���t help but thinking about what i���ve lived. during the day, mainly at night, when looking at the sky full of stars, i can���t help but longing for seeing again what was recorded so deeply in my mind. i don���t even know what it was for its huge size and how silent it was. it was like a zepellin in a diamond shape that moved slowly and silently, with all its windows in bright white light, some twinkling. it did not bothered my eyes.

{cms/jat/pid} text moved to narrative
content.summary: 100 to 300 meters (long), 8 floors, 80 to 120 white lights some of them twinkling.

content.detailedDescription: My freind and i were driving on back road from trenton ohio towards middletown one night around10 or 11 oclock.We happen to see a large fire ball falling from the sky.We stopped the truck and got out and watched it.This thing looked like it was maybe 20 or 30 miles away.It was a large ball of fire with a long fire tale behind it.It had alot of different colors behind the tail and then tailed out to regular fire color.This thing was huge.It came in at an angle of west to east.Ilived in franklin ohio at the time and it looked like it could of landed near there,of course i know i could of been off by many miles but that is what it looked like to us.As soon as it went down we were standing in shock.And in afew seconds heard a jet like sound coming souyh to north towards the direction of were it went down.Inever heard a jet sound like this,very fast and quiet with no lights.The direction this thing landed near even if i was wrom by 20 miles or so was near right pat air force base.They had to of known about this thing. the next day it was all over the wlw radio station seen as far away as 400 miles in 3 different states.The radio station called norad live on the radio to ask what it was people saw.They claimed nothing fell from the sky that night.I am 50 years old and this is the first and ony time i have seen something like this.Now i know first hand our goverment dont tell us the truth.Listening to all the callers that morning i didnt hear anyone say they heard the jet.I did.
content.summary: Watched large fire ball come down from sky for about two minutes.

content.detailedDescription: April 1985 i was working corrosion control in my squadron, at 3 am i was done and went to the tarmac and climbed up on an airplane. i watched the stars and noticed a high altitude drifting balloon i thought, yet it drifted oddly and bounced back and forth, then stopped overhead, bobbing back and forth, it came from the north east. then i saw a meteor coming from the southwest direction from the horizon to  overhead in less than 3 seconds and stopped next to the other object, they oscillated together for a while, i got scared and ran back to the hanger.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Drifting grey star dull  stopped ,shooting star added and stopped next to other

content.detailedDescription:
I am a mufon member from bulgaria and an author of a blog about ufo news in bulgarian language. i was contacted, through the blog, by a witness with the request to help him with translating and submitting the report. the following is the translation of his first email to me:

hello. my name is p.S., 41 y.O. from tryavna, bulgaria. on 1 october, 2008, at 2:00am something woke me up and i decided to look through the window. i opened slightly the curtain and was shocked. against the window, in the sky, i saw six orange colored ufo-s arranged in a triangular formation. each of the objects was with the size of a full moon, a little smaller. the objects were moving from east to the west. i looked at them till they arrived above the house. then i quickly left the house and went out, in the yard. there happened something incredible. the whole triangle turned sharply to the left. the six objects began to exchange their positions till they rearranged themselves again in a triangular formation and continued moving to the sought-west. i am interested in astronomy and astronomic observations since i was a pupil and i know that this couldn���t be a natural phenomenon. i know only that this could be operated only by intelligent beings. i believe in extraterrestrial life. since october, i make regular night observations and i believe that i���ll see them again. unfortunately, i am alone in tryavna and have no one here to share my views and experience.

the following is some additional information i received from p.S. in other e-mails:

the next day, on 1 october, i went to the police station and reported my sighting. i asked whether they had received other signals about this. they just looked at me and shrugged. probably they thought that i���m crazy, but they were three policemen there. after the police, i went to the editorial office of the local newspaper ���tryavna week���. they also didn���t have any information but looked interested in publishing my story in the newspaper. i refused because i���m a public figure and i was afraid they may think that i am crazy, on drugs, or drunk. 

you asked did i make any photos. it was 2:00 am; i was dumbfounded and even didn���t think to take my cell phone to make pictures. all this happened very quickly, in 1-1.5 minutes. the objects were moving quite fast, but i was able to examine them well enough. there were no sounds. it was dark and quiet. the objects were moving smoothly and didn���t make any noise. while they were making the maneuver, i was paralyzed with fear because i didn���t expect it. when i saw the objects above the house, they looked perfect circles. when they moved away, to the west, they looked more like baseballs.

after i entered back in the house, i didn���t look at the clock because i didn���t turn on the lights. i briefly looked at the clock on my cell phone only when i woke up and before looking through the window. back in the house, after the sighting, i laid down but couldn���t sleep at all. 10 minutes later i gathered some courage and went out again. and this continued all night, walking in and out of the house. do i think that they ���saw��� me? yes, definitely. now i have this strange feeling like they are looking at me all the time. a few days later, i was searching the web and found on some american website a picture that looked exactly like what i saw. only that one was made of 10 objects. mine were 6. i was completely delighted to find out that other people have seen the same thing i saw. 

should you be interested in receiving more information from p.S. or from me, please, contact us at the provided e-mails. three days ago i tried to contact the bulgarian mufon chapter with no success. 
the attached are 2 drawings of the triangular formation made by p.S. daughter under his supervision. the photo shows his house on the left and was made later, from the spot, where he was looking at the objects. the direction is sough-sought-east and is the place, where the objects rearanged their positions.
content.summary: Six large objects moving in triangular formation, rearrange positions and make sharp turn.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my room on the second floor of the house & i was on my computer, when i received a phone call from my uncle about something, well i don't get good cell service @ my house so i proceeded to my bedroom deck where there is better service. as i was talking, i was facing the river & out of the corner of my eye i noticed something flickering. i began to watch it and thought @ first that it was a star because of its glowing nature. then i realized, it then had three distinct colors that i could see with the naked eye. red, green, and a yellowish looking color, and it looked as if it was moving towards my direction. i went back inside and grabbed my binoculars and then it became clear that it was not a star, nor a plane, and it looked as if it was some big ball or circle that went into a point @ the top, but the interesting thing is that it looked like it was changing very fast from a point or like some triangle back to a round circle or actually completing back the bottome part of the circle to make a whole circle. i was pretty amazed and confused on what it could be. i went & grabbed my parents to let them take a look @ the object and they as well couldn't figure it out & were amazed as well that they have never seen anything like that. i took my dad's telescope and the pair of binoculars and got in my car and drove to my dad's church that has an amazing view of the sky. i picked my uncle up on the way as it was only about 2 minutes down there road to the church. we both set the telescope up & it was extrodinary, & unexplainable to both of us. we stay there about 2 1/2 hours & watched the object. it stayed still pretty much the whole time exept when i was on my deck @ the house, when it looked as if it was coming closer. after two & half hours later it started to move towards the left of our position, then with extrodinary speed, went the opposite direction, & it kind of remind me when someone sees a shooting star, i followed only for a split second and it was gone.
content.summary: Circular with extremely bright lights coming off of it. it looked as if i was looking @ an array of colors from the spectrum that were pulsating. while the colors were pulsating a green, red, yellowish looking color was was going around this object fast.

content.detailedDescription: Flying saucer hovering over my neighborhood. the were blueish purple lights cycling in a pattern from the center to the outer perimeter of the craft. picture and video clip taken on wireless phone just black screen because it was after 10:00 pm. the flying saucer was large and silent.
content.summary: Flying saucer xmas eve

content.detailedDescription: I was washing dishes it appeared out the window far to the south. in the southwest, at first object looked like a bright planet, but on further inspection it was bomerang shape with 3 red lights on each point at the bottom. a bright beam of light pointing north. a bright focused light seemed to be beaming in specific directions in intervals. then 4 bright objects were shot out from the south side about one minute apart, in a direct horizontal line. the object became very bright before fading over the horizon to the west. i have never seen anything like this, at one point it looked like a perfect triangle with a bright light on the top. i did not have any particular feelings, other than wishing someone else was with me to bare witness. i sent warm greetings, and peace to all life. i must not that earlier today around noon i felt an intense sound pressure in my ears.
content.summary: Over pacific ocean northwest usa.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my girlfriend were sitting in a very dark secluded are looking up at the stars and constellations.  i noticed one object high in the sky which was unusually bright and at a high altitude.  i was looking at it to figure if it was a star and after about a minute it started to move around in rapid back and forth and up and down motion.  off in the horizon my girlfriend had noticed a round disk that was hovering the moved violently around like it was confused and then darted off at a very high rate of speed.  after a few minutes the object that i had noticed had moved closer.  what had looked like one one light turned into three and had the shape of a boomerang.  after a minute it had climbed back up to very high altitude. i watched it move around for a little while at this high altitude to watch it then fad away.  i have to say after noticing this i was a little scared but at the same time confused of what it was and feel maybe i was seeing things.  i feel very strongly on the fact that they were not planes.  i do live in a highly air trafficked area one of which include mc gwire air force base so i do know a plane when i see one and i know all the markings and lights that they are supposed to have on.  both objects did have any of these markings nor lights to identify them as an aircraft. maybe i am seeing things which i hope i am not or it is something that can be explained to what me and my girlfriend have noticed.
content.summary: Two ufos wittnessed by me and my girlfriend.

content.detailedDescription:
At approx 10 pm this evening i was outside checking my neighbors heat pump. i happened to look up at the stars (no clouds) and noticed what appeared to be 3 sets of lights headed in my direction. 

two of the aircraft had 4 white lights in a boomerang fashion with two red strobes in between. these two appeared to be very close, one in front of the other. much closer than i would expect aircraft to be operating at night. 

the third aircraft displayed just 3 white lights in a triangular formation. it was located off to the right of the other two. 

i called my girlfriend out to see them and i remarked how crazy i thought the pilots were for being so close to one another at night. it was then as they passed right over our heads, from west to east, that we both noticed they made no sound at all. no jet noise, no prop engine, nothing. 

i am a 15 year veteran of the us navy and i have been around numerous aircraft. these objects were less than 2k feet and didnt make a sound. we live in a very quiet neighborhood so we would have heard some kind of engine noise. 

they continued east and just prior to them passing out of view due to tree cover we observed a red light rise from the 3rd aircraft (the one with just 3 white lights). the red light rose up from it and then disappeared.
content.summary: A triangular set of lights with what appeared to be 2 aircraft to the left.

content.detailedDescription: At approx 7:20 while i was outside a parking lot after work, i saw coming from the east horizon heading west, a lighted triangular shaped object that resembled a kite or a bird with it's wings wide open. however, the object was outlined with low dim yellowish lights that defined its shape and direction of travel. it was noiseless and flew with some sort of intelligent control. it kept same speed until it got out of sight. i called the houston chronicle news desk as well as ch 11 houston news room and gave a detailed description of my sighting in case someone else would call it in. i was unable to take any photo of video, it caught me unprepared.
content.summary: Triangular shaped lighted all over . no blinking or strobe lights. flew noiseless. it was traveling as fast a small plane. from alvin,tx towards houston tx.

content.detailedDescription: But it was moving away steady straight ese i was in my yard i noticed it because it was at least twice as bright as planet  no flashing plane lites and it was so steady in trajectory .Iam writeing because i have it on my mind daily but a show the other night showed an object with that same flame it was so candle like not like a jet blasting flame i can still see it in my mind.Like mesmoriseing peacefull.It kept a straight path bright lite got smaller and smaller untillllll it was gone
content.summary: Was looking at bright planet west sky. a very brite obj. apperd. to rt, look like searchlite chopper. very brite was move ese steady strait no plane lites then noticed briefly blue candle like flame.  very brite wht lite always there as if headlite.
